findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead and increases unnecessarily the gas consumption since Solidity versions 0.8.0 and above have native functionality that replaces it.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow Solidity naming convention guidelines, which can decrease readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can occur due to conditional statements that are always false, functions that are never called, or unreachable code, making a contract more difficult to understand and maintain.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract does not validate variable setters which can lead to unexpected behavior or errors and make it vulnerable to exploitation.
